item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Punisher , Blue dragon (Support)
item.dc:creator: SoulShard
item.description:
I am liking the direction that you are going with but I have a few things I would like, to sum up

1st I don’t think he really suits the role of the support seeing how he has the ability to kill. it would make more sense for him to be an Offensive or a killer with this set of ability’s

2nd by confirmed blue dragon I am guessing it is determined by effects such as sheriff (Reveal Mustache [1x] Reveal yourself as The Sheriff) and if this is the case that ability won’t see much play sadly

and finally please change the spelling of Torcher to Torture it took me a while to figure out what you meant,

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Punisher , Blue dragon (Support)
item.dc:creator: ozdeger
item.description:
Name: The Punisher
Affliction: Blue Dragon
Role: Support

Lore: an old prison warden who got insane with the thought of justice.

Day Abilities:

Torture [Edited by Xblade ^_^]: Anyday that a confirmed Blue Dragon member killed (not voted), that night you can torcher someone revealing their “visits” at last 2 nights. Your target will be occupied and you can chat with him anonymously.
ON/Notification: -you saw another innocent fall, you could feel your anger at your hands. they were shaking… for justice.

Night Abilities:

Relentless Attack: If there was no “evil” role that died in the last 2 days, you can attack someone brutally, both of you resulting dead. Your target will die even if theyy are “night immune”
ON/Notification: -You were covered with the thoughts of revenge and murder.
OFF/Notification: -You saw another murderer fall, you started thinking clearly again.

Interractions:
you will be detected as an enemy if a princess uses “flirt” on you.

during the “day” if a prince chooses to jail the punisher, he will be notified as “your target had a key to get out of the jail” prince will spend the night with no one jailed and the prince wont have the option to jail the punisher afterwards.
